txt.en: Ardhun arrives
'Onwards, then.'
More Draig-lûth warriors appear in force
Instance: A Reunion Bittersweet
The Draig-lûth attack!
Eluna has survived the attempt on her life, thanks in no small part to your valour.\n\nYou should talk to Eluna.
Wait for Ardhun to arrive.
You have strayed too far from your hiding place
Defend Eluna
Regroup with Eluna and her students
You set out with Eluna and her students to a high-stakes negotiation.
Remain alert.
Talk to Eluna before the negotiation begins.
<rgb=#FF0000>Erlys has been defeated!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not get too close to Eluna and Ardhun's conversation</rgb>
Talk to Eluna
You should defend Eluna
'I may not trust the Rangers, but I'd like to do this with minimal bloodshed if possible. Follow me.'
The fight is over.\n\nRegroup with the others.
Listen to Eluna and Ardhun's conversation.
You have been spotted by Ardhun
'We return to Lhan Garan without delay. Ardhun will come with us. I will take responsibility for her.'
'I hope we can resolve this with words alone, but if not, I will count on you to fight. Stay hidden unless you are needed.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Eluna has been defeated!</rgb>
Wait for Ardhun to arrive
Listen to Eluna and Ardhun's conversation
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not stray too far from your hiding place</rgb>
Remain on guard as more Draig-lûth arrive
Talk to Eluna
